data.actual_result: The profile pops up without any roles the person has.
data.expected_result: The profile pops up with the roles the person has.
data.short_description: If there is a pinned message, and someone clicks the name in "user pinned a message to this channel" it won't show the users roles.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a pinned message - Click on the username in "user has pinned a message to this channel"
